alert.note: Alert for Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 22 at 2:44PM MST until December 24 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM FRIDAY TO 5 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches. Highest snow intensities are expected Friday afternoon. * WHERE...Highway 200 Bonner to Greenough, Highway 83 Seeley Lake to Condon, and I-90 East Missoula to Bearmouth. * WHEN...From 11 AM Friday to 5 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
